name: Sawk
author: Shigenori Negishi
flavor_text: Desiring the strongest karate chop, they seclude themselves in mountains and train without sleeping.

attacks.name: Quick Guard
attacks.effect: Prevent all damage done to this Pokémon by attacks from Basic Pokémon during your opponent’s next turn. This Pokémon can’t use Quick Guard during your next turn.

attacks.name: Brick Break
attacks.effect: This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Resistance or any effects on your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
